Localization.Name: OpalSky
Localization.Description: Classic, simple and timeless, OpalSky creates casual attire. What millionaires wear when lounging on their space yachts.

English.Name: OpalSky
English.Description: Classic, simple and timeless, OpalSky creates casual attire. What millionaires wear when lounging on their space yachts.

Localization.Name: Mivaldi Pants Purple
Localization.Description:
Carrying Capacity: 0.5K µSCU

Cut to a narrow fit, OpalSky's Mivaldi pants feature bold asymmetrical design with smart yet casual dual material styling, making it the perfect addition to any wardrobe.

Women's sizes currently out of stock.
